alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 3:04PM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam affecting Adams and Juneau Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:10 PM CDT Tuesday the flow was 28,580 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening and continue rising to 36,100.0 cfs early Tuesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood flow is 30,000 cfs. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening.
